title: Joe Biden’s Ancestors Owned Slaves … Will the Left Care? | 10/12/20
description:
One conservative man was left dead at clashing protests in Denver after a local news channel’s security guard opened fire. He’s reportedly not associated with Antifa, but Glenn reveals he is apparently a leftist. Commentator Keith Olbermann called for Trump supporters to be “prosecuted” and “removed from our society." Antifa is an idea … just like Nazism. Yelp will tag businesses accused of racism, and Antifa is planning to exploit it. Glenn reveals how Joe Biden’s ancestors were slaveholders. Will the cancel culture pick up this story? Supreme Court nominee Amy Coney Barrett’s Senate hearing has begun. Biden said voters don’t deserve to know his stance on packing the court and instead claimed the GOP is packing it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
itunes:subtitle: Glenn dives into Joe Biden’s genealogy and reveals how some of his ancestors were slaveholders. Will the leftist cancel culture care at all?
